Class AttackCyclopsData

Namespace
ECCLibrary.Data

ECCLibrary.dll

Contains data pertaining to creating the AttackCyclops CreatureAction.

public class AttackCyclopsData

Constructors

AttackCyclopsData(float, float, float, float, float, float, float) 

public AttackCyclopsData(float evaluatePriority, float swimVelocity, float maxDistToLeash, float aggressPerSecond, float attackPause, float aggressionFalloff, float attackAggressionThreshold = 0.75)

Parameters

evaluatePriority float

The priority for this CreatureAction, expected to be in the range [0, 1].

swimVelocity float

Swim speed when swimming toward a Cyclops.

maxDistToLeash float

If the Cyclops is this many meters or more away from the creature's spawn point (leash position), it will be ignored. Generally has a value of 100f or more.

aggressPerSecond float

The amount of aggression gained per second while aware of a Cyclops. Note that this aggression is linked to 'AttackCyclops.aggressiveToNoise', NOT 'Creature.Aggression'.
Generally 0.2f for smaller creatures and 0.4f for a leviathan.

attackPause float

Minimum amount of time between each "attack". Generally 6 seconds for smaller creatures and 3 seconds for a leviathan.

aggressionFalloff float

How fast the aggression to noise decreases. Typically 0.08f for smaller creatures and 0.01f for leviathans.

attackAggressionThreshold float

Minimum aggression to attack. All vanilla creatures use a value of 0.75f.
